diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Gall stone pancreatitis status post ERCP with stone extraction and laparoscopic cholecystectomy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with abdominal pain, fever, jaundice, elevated LFTs, and pancreatic enzymes, along with CT findings of cholelithiasis and CBD enlargement. ERCP revealed a stone in the CBD that was successfully extracted, which correlated with the acute pancreatitis diagnosis.
